title: BC链接问题
author: Gerryawa
txt_content:
整了个bc，接了登陆服和生存服
我设置了在登陆服登录完后会自动传送到生存（authme插件）
但是到了生存服后重进就会直接在生存服,不会去登录服
bc设置的默认服务器是登录服
我的bc设置:


listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - login
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:1612
  max_players: 20
  tab_size: 20
  force_default_server: false
  motd: '&bNeysh &f| &8[&31.16.1&8] &f| &a生存服务器                      &c服务器可能即将关停,谢谢你们的支持'
remote_ping_cache: -1
network_compression_threshold: 256
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
log_pings: true
connection_throttle_limit: 3
server_connect_timeout: 5000
timeout: 30000
stats: be0cb2d0-04cb-4fd4-845e-1768824ad120
player_limit: 1
ip_forward: true
groups:
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
connection_throttle: 4000
log_commands: false
prevent_proxy_connections: true
online_mode: false
forge_support: true
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
servers:
  login:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25566
    restricted: false
  scoutside:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25568
    restricted: false
复制代码

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content:
你这个配置是要被提权的节奏。

force_default_server: false改为true
然后记得装上authmebungee，不然会被提权
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/authmebungee.50219
